name: io.github.zcaceres/fetch-mcp
description: This MCP server provides functionality to fetch web content in various formats, including HTML, JSON, plain text, and Markdown.

tools.name: fetch_html
tools.description: Fetch a website and return the content as HTML

url.description: URL of the website to fetch

headers.description: Optional headers to include in the request

tools.name: fetch_markdown
tools.description: Fetch a website and return the content as Markdown

url.description: URL of the website to fetch

headers.description: Optional headers to include in the request

tools.name: fetch_txt
tools.description: Fetch a website, return the content as plain text (no HTML)

url.description: URL of the website to fetch

headers.description: Optional headers to include in the request

tools.name: fetch_json
tools.description: Fetch a JSON file from a URL

url.description: URL of the JSON to fetch

headers.description: Optional headers to include in the request
